files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.AnimationCategoriesChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for animation category changes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.AnimationCategory
files.Summary: Categorizes animations by their type for state management.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.AnimationManager
files.Summary: Manages running animations and coordinates frame updates.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.BoxSelectionAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a box selection rectangle.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.CategorizedAnimationWrapper
files.Summary: Wrapper that adds category information to any animation.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.DelayAnimation
files.Summary: A delay animation that does nothing for a specified duration, then completes. Useful for sequencing animations with pauses.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.Easing
files.Summary: Easing functions for animations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.EdgeColorAnimation
files.Summary: Animates an edge's stroke color.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.EdgeFadeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates an edge's opacity for fade in/out effects.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.EdgeFlowAnimation
files.Summary: Animates an edge's stroke dash offset for a "flow" effect.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.EdgePulseAnimation
files.Summary: Animates an edge's stroke thickness for pulse/highlight effects.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.GenericAnimation
files.Summary: A generic animation that calls an update action with the normalized progress (0-1). Useful for simple animations or sequencing multiple animation phases.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.GroupChildrenFadeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates children of a group fading in or out.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.GroupCollapseAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a group's collapse or expand transition.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.IAnimation
files.Summary: Represents an animation that can be updated over time.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.ICategorizedAnimation
files.Summary: Extended animation interface that includes category information.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.LayoutAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a set of nodes from their current positions to target positions. Intended for layout transitions (auto-layout, arrange, etc.).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.MultiEdgeFadeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates multiple edges simultaneously with the same animation parameters.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.MultiNodeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates multiple nodes' positions simultaneously.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.MultiNodeAppearAnimation
files.Summary: Animates multiple nodes appearing/disappearing simultaneously.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.NodeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a node's position.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.NodeAppearAnimation
files.Summary: Combines fade and scale for a complete appear/disappear effect.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.NodeFadeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a node's opacity for fade in/out effects.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.NodeScaleAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a node's scale for pop/shrink effects.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.ParallelAnimation
files.Summary: A group of animations that run in parallel.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.SelectionBorderAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a node's selection border fading in.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.SelectionPulseAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a selection highlight pulse effect.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.SequenceAnimation
files.Summary: A sequence of animations that run one after another.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.ViewportAnimation
files.Summary: Animates viewport transitions (pan and zoom).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.FlowBackground

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.FlowPanel

files.Summary: A floating toolbar that appears near selected nodes. Inspired by React Flow's NodeToolbar component.

files.Summary: Event args for edge disconnection (dropped in empty space).

files.Summary: Event args for edge label edit request. Raised when a user double-clicks an edge label to edit it.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.EdgeReconnectedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for edge reconnection.

files.Summary: FlowCanvas partial - Animation API and helpers.

files.Summary: Configuration settings for the FlowCanvas control.

files.Summary: Renders the background grid for the canvas using efficient drawing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GroupCollapsedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for group collapsed state change.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GroupManager
files.Summary: Manages group operations including auto-sizing, collapse state, and drag-to-add.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GroupProxyManager
files.Summary: Manages proxy ports and edge re-routing when groups are collapsed. When a group is collapsed, edges that cross the group boundary are re-routed to proxy ports on the group, maintaining visual connectivity.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GroupToggleCollapseEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for group collapse toggle request.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.IInputState
files.Summary: Base interface for all canvas input states. Implements the State Pattern for clean input handling.

files.Summary: Base class for input states with default implementations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.InputStateContext
files.Summary: Shared context passed to all input states. Contains references to canvas components and raises events.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.InputStateMachine
files.Summary: Manages input state transitions and delegates events to the current state.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.StateChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for state changes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.StateTransitionResult
files.Summary: Represents the result of a state transition.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.AnimatingNodesState
files.Summary: Input state active during node animations (position transitions, appear/disappear effects). Allows viewport interactions (pan/zoom) while blocking node interactions.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.AnimatingState
files.Summary: Input state used while animations are running. While active, user input is suppressed to prevent conflicts with animated transitions.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.AnimatingViewportState
files.Summary: Input state active during viewport animations (pan/zoom transitions). Allows cancellation via click or key press, and permits zoom wheel interactions.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.BoxSelectingState
files.Summary: State for box selection of multiple nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.ConnectingState
files.Summary: State for creating a new connection by dragging from a port.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.DraggingState
files.Summary: State for dragging selected nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.IdleState
files.Summary: The default idle state - handles initial interactions and transitions to other states.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.PanningState
files.Summary: State for panning the canvas viewport.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.ReconnectingState
files.Summary: State for reconnecting an existing edge by dragging its endpoint. Similar to React Flow's reconnectable edges - the edge visual updates in real-time.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.ResizingState
files.Summary: State for resizing a node via drag handles.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Layout.LayoutTransitionManager
files.Summary: Provides a minimal API for animating layout transitions (node position changes) without coupling to layout algorithms.

files.Summary: Event args for node drag start event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeDragStopEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node drag stop event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeLabelEditRequestedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node label edit request. Raised when a user double-clicks a node to edit its label.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeResizedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node resize completion.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeResizingEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node resize in progress.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodesAddedToGroupEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for nodes added to group.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodesDraggedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node drag completion.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodesDraggingEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for nodes being dragged (in progress).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ProxyEdgeInfo
files.Summary: Information about a proxied edge.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ProxyPortInfo
files.Summary: Information about a proxy port on a collapsed group.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.DirectGraphRenderer
files.Summary:
A high-performance graph renderer that draws directly to a DrawingContext, bypassing the Avalonia visual tree for nodes and edges. This is optimized for large graphs (500+ nodes) where per-element Controls are too slow.

Uses GraphRenderModel for all geometry calculations to ensure 100% visual parity with the normal VisualTree renderer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.EdgePathHelper
files.Summary: Helper class for creating edge path geometries between points.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.EdgeVisualManager
files.Summary: Manages rendering and tracking of edge visuals including paths, markers, and labels. Responsible for creating, updating, and removing edge UI elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.GraphRenderModel
files.Summary: Central model that calculates all rendering geometry for a graph. This is the single source of truth for node bounds, port positions, edge paths, etc. Both VisualTree rendering and DirectDraw rendering use this model to ensure 100% visual parity.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.GraphRenderer
files.Summary: Coordinates rendering of all graph elements (nodes, ports, edges, handles). Acts as a facade over specialized visual managers for clean separation of concerns.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.DefaultNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Default node renderer that creates a standard bordered box with text. Supports inline label editing via IEditableNodeRenderer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.DirectNodeRenderContext
files.Summary: Context passed to with pre-calculated values.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.GroupCollapseEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for group collapse toggle.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.GroupNodeRenderer
files.Summary:
Renderer for group nodes that contain other nodes. Uses a translucent background similar to React Flow's grouping style. Supports inline label editing via IEditableNodeRenderer.

IMPORTANT: This renderer uses constants from GraphRenderModel to ensure 100% visual parity with DirectGraphRenderer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.IDirectNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for custom node renderers that support direct DrawingContext rendering. Implement this interface in addition to to provide custom drawing logic for the high-performance DirectGraphRenderer mode.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.IEditableNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for node renderers that support inline label editing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.INodeRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for custom node renderers. Implement this interface to create custom visual representations for node types.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.InputNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renderer for input nodes with a distinctive green color scheme. Displays a ">" icon and supports inline label editing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.NodeRenderContext
files.Summary: Context information passed to node renderers.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.NodeRendererRegistry
files.Summary: Registry for custom node type renderers. Register custom renderers to handle specific node types.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.OutputNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renderer for output nodes with a distinctive red/coral color scheme. Displays a target/circle icon and supports inline label editing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.SimplifiedNodeRenderer
files.Summary: A simplified node renderer optimized for large graphs. Uses minimal visual elements for better performance with 500+ nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.StyledNodeRendererBase
files.Summary:
Base class for styled node renderers with icon and label support. Provides customizable colors, icons (text or geometry), and inline editing.

Override the abstract properties to customize appearance: - : Default text when no label is set - , : Node colors - , : Text/icon colors

For icons, override ONE of: - : Simple text icon (e.g., ">", "O", "?") - : Vector path for scalable icons (compatible with any icon library)

Using a Lucide icon path: 
// Get path data from any icon library (Lucide, Material, etc.)
protected override Geometry? IconGeometry => 
    Geometry.Parse("M5 12h14M12 5l7 7-7 7"); // arrow-right

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeVisualManager
files.Summary: Manages rendering and tracking of node and port visuals. Responsible for creating, updating, and removing node/port UI elements. Uses GraphRenderModel for all geometry calculations to ensure visual parity with DirectGraphRenderer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.RenderContext
files.Summary: Shared rendering context containing settings, viewport state, and coordinate transformation utilities. Used by all visual managers to ensure consistent rendering behavior.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ResizeHandleManager
files.Summary: Manages rendering and tracking of resize handle visuals for nodes. Responsible for creating, updating, and removing resize handle UI elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ResizeHandlePosition
files.Summary: Positions for resize handles on a node.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ThemeResources
files.Summary:
Provides theme-aware resource access for FlowCanvas components.

All colors can be customized by defining resources in your App.axaml: 

<Application.Resources>
    <SolidColorBrush x:Key="FlowCanvasNodeBackground" Color="#2D2D30"/>
    <SolidColorBrush x:Key="FlowCanvasNodeBorder" Color="#4682B4"/>
    <!-- etc. -->
</Application.Resources>

Available resource keys:

  • Canvas: FlowCanvasBackground, FlowCanvasGridColor
  • Node: FlowCanvasNodeBackground, FlowCanvasNodeBorder, FlowCanvasNodeSelectedBorder, FlowCanvasNodeText
  • Input Node: FlowCanvasInputNodeBackground, FlowCanvasInputNodeBorder, FlowCanvasInputNodeText, FlowCanvasInputNodeIcon
  • Output Node: FlowCanvasOutputNodeBackground, FlowCanvasOutputNodeBorder, FlowCanvasOutputNodeText, FlowCanvasOutputNodeIcon
  • Edge: FlowCanvasEdgeStroke, FlowCanvasEdgeSelectedStroke
  • Port: FlowCanvasPortBackground, FlowCanvasPortBorder, FlowCanvasPortHover, FlowCanvasPortValidConnection, FlowCanvasPortInvalidConnection
  • Group: FlowCanvasGroupBackground, FlowCanvasGroupBorder, FlowCanvasGroupLabelText
  • Selection: FlowCanvasSelectionBoxFill, FlowCanvasSelectionBoxStroke
  • Minimap: FlowCanvasMinimapBackground, FlowCanvasMinimapViewportFill, FlowCanvasMinimapViewportStroke
